title: Best of The Program |  5/3/21
description:
Mitt Romney was booed at a GOP convention in Utah. Glenn gives some good news on Southlake, Texas, parents’ fight against critical race theory entering their schools. Beware what schools are now calling "culturally responsive teaching." A SpaceX crew has successfully returned to Earth. Meanwhile, China has no idea where a massive part of its latest rocket will crash-land.
